title: Slayer task/Bears

properties.name: description
properties.value: Bears can be assigned as a slayer task at level 13 combat by various slayer masters. Bears can be found in various locations throughout Gielinor.

content:
Bears
Requirements
SkillsNone
Combat level 13
OtherNone
Task Amounts
Turael15-50
Krystilia50-100
Mazchna40-70
Advanced data
Icon IDNo

Bears can be assigned as a slayer task at level 13 combat by various slayer masters. Bears can be found in various locations throughout Gielinor.

Black bears, bear cubs, grizzly bears, grizzly bear cubs, reanimated bears, and Callisto can all be killed to satisfy the task. Angry bears (found in Tolna's rift), the Headless Beast (fought during the quest Getting Ahead), and the Crystalline and Corrupted Bear (fought in the Gauntlet and the Corrupted Gauntlet respectively) do not count towards the task.

Those with lower combat levels would find it in their best interest to kill bear cubs, found in the Fremennik Province and throughout Kourend. Black bears would also be a good option, with a combat level of 19. Grizzly bears in most cases are an option if they are close, as most are level 21 combat. The only level 42 combat grizzly bears are found in Tirannwn. Grizzly bear cubs, too, can only be found in Tirannwn, with combat levels ranging from 33 to 36. Callisto is not a recommended alternative, due to its location being in deep Wilderness.

Players with 60% Arceuus favour, 21 Magic, ensouled bear heads, and are on the Arceuus spellbook may find reanimated bears easier to kill then regular bears, due to their lower hitpoints.

Monster Variants[edit | edit source]

Monster Combat

Level

Slayer

XP

Locations Notes
Bear Cub 15 20
  • Fremennik Province - woods outside of Rellekka
  • Great Kourend - north of Land's End
  • Great Kourend - north-east of Shayzien
  • Kebos Lowlands - south of Mount Quidamortem
  • Kebos Lowlands - east of the Farming Guild
  • The greatest number of bear cubs can be found outside of Rellekka.
Black bear 19 25
  • Kebos Lowlands - east of the Farming Guild
  • Entrana
  • Gnome Maze
  • North-east of the Observatory
  • Outside of the Mind Altar
  • South-east of Gu'Tanoth
  • Varrock south-east mine
  • The greatest number of black bears can be found outside of the Mind Altar.
Callisto 470 312
  • South of the Demonic Ruins
  • See strategies on this page.
Grizzly bear 21, 42 27, 35 See here for a list of locations.
  • This is by far the most widespread bear, making it easy to find and kill.
Grizzly bear cub 33, 36 35
  • Isafdar
  • North-east of Tyras Camp (instanced)
  • Prifddinas (outside of the city)
  • West of Lletya
  • West of Lletya (during Song of the Elves)
  • Requires partial completion of Regicide.

[[Bear]]s can be assigned as a [[slayer task]] at level 13 [[combat]] by various [[slayer master]]s. Bears can be found in various locations throughout [[Gielinor]].

[[Black bear]]s, [[Bear Cub|bear cubs]], [[grizzly bear]]s, [[grizzly bear cub]]s, [[reanimated bear]]s, and [[Callisto]] can all be killed to satisfy the task. [[Angry bear]]s (found in [[Tolna's rift]]), the [[Headless Beast]] (fought during the [[Quests|quest]] [[Getting Ahead]]), and the [[Crystalline Bear|Crystalline]] and [[Corrupted Bear]] (fought in the [[Gauntlet]] and the [[Corrupted gauntlet|Corrupted Gauntlet]] respectively) do '''not''' count towards the task.

Those with lower combat levels would find it in their best interest to kill bear cubs, found in the [[Fremennik Province]] and throughout [[Great Kourend|Kourend]].  Black bears would also be a good option, with a combat level of 19.  Grizzly bears in most cases are an option if they are close,  as most are level 21 combat. The only level 42 combat grizzly bears are found in [[Tirannwn]]. Grizzly bear cubs, too, can only be found in Tirannwn, with combat levels ranging from 33 to 36. Callisto is not a recommended alternative, due to its location being in deep [[Wilderness]].

Players with 60% [[Arceuus]] [[favour]], 21 [[Magic]], [[ensouled bear head]]s, and are on the [[Arceuus spells|Arceuus spellbook]] may find reanimated bears easier to kill then regular bears, due to their lower [[hitpoints]].
